pageContent: Objective: The aim of this study was to study the effect of postoperative physiotherapist-guided pelvic floor muscle training (PFMT) on health-related quality of life (HRQoL) parameters in patients treated with radical prostatectomy (RP).

metaData.source:
Prevalence of erectile dysfunction in men screened for prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/19428072/
